name: LustyVerse: ShackBang
description:
When a young man drives his friends to a remote cabin in the woods, he expects to have a drink or two with them, then drive back home by morning.

However, things turn out differently. What he thinks was supposed to be a fun reunion between former best friends from the cheerleading squad, turns into a week filled with unexpected occurences, fun, terror, and so much more than that...

As deeply hidden secrets get unearthed, he realizes you can never really truly know anyone. That doesn't stop him from trying, though, and what follows is a week he'll never forget.



She is a calm and quiet girl, still a little bitter about her past, when she used to be the least popular friend. However, once you get to know her, her sarcastic one liners and smart comebacks just might make you want to keep talking to her.


She is the one who keeps the fun going, and the booze flowing. One of those girls you probably had a crush on at some point in your life. Lexi likes to make jokes about everyone, herself included, but that doesn't mean she can't recognize a deadly serious situation.


Even though her appearance is wild, she is someone you could really chill with. A cool girl, who doesn't like to complicate things too much. At least so it seems...


Tough, resilient and successful - that's this redhead bombshell in a nutshell. However, Maxine also has a hidden soft side, which she saves only for the selected few...



Game Content:
  • 10.000 + IMAGES
  • 130 + ANIMATIONS

Gameplay:
  • Define the relationships within the game
  • Choices that matter
  • Branching Story
  • Gallery Room
  • Multiple endigns
  • Nude Mode
  • Slut Angle
  • Change Angles on Images
  • Lust Time (interactive sex scenes)

WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content, drug abuse and controversial sexual content (incest) that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.
